籤詩版本二:
Icing pa keke imakhala yokongola kwambiri, ndipo mwayi umabweretsa zabwino ndi mwayi.
Anthu a nthawiyo sayenera kudandaula kuti adadziwika mochedwa m'moyo wawo ndipo adadziwika padziko lonse lapansi m'modzi adagwa.
詩意:
Hexagram iyi ndi icing pa keke.
Zabwino zonse.
解曰: Chakale chimakhala chatsopano. Tumizani ku zida zomalizidwa. Choncho cholinga cha moyo wake. Zonse ndi tsogolo.
籤詩故事一:
◇Liang Haodengke
Katswiri, Liang Hao (963-1004), dzina laulemu Taisu, anabadwira ku Xucheng, Yunzhou (tsopano Dongping, Shandong) mu Mzera wa Nyimbo.
Mu ulamuliro wa Yongxi, adapambana mayeso a Jinshi ali ndi zaka khumi ndi zisanu ndi zitatu. Kupitiliza kufunsira mayeso kunalephera.
Anayamba kulemba mayeso m'chaka chachitatu cha Tianfu.Iye amakhoza mayeso chaka chilichonse kupyolera mu ufumu wa Han pambuyo pake ndi mzera wa pambuyo pake wa Zhou, koma amalephera chaka chilichonse. Analumbira kuti sangayanjanenso ngati sapambana mphoto yoyamba.
Ali ndi zaka makumi asanu ndi atatu mphambu ziwiri, m’chaka chachiwiri cha ulamuliro wa Yongxi wa Mfumu Zhenzong ya Ufumu wa Nyimbo, adalandira mphoto yoyamba.
聖意: Pemphererani chitetezo chapakhomo (chabwino), chitetezo chaumwini, phindu lachuma, kugulitsa, ukwati, oyenda pansi aamuna a Liujia, mphutsi za silika za ku Chiti, mfundo zisanu ndi zitatu, nyama zisanu ndi imodzi, kufunafuna anthu, milandu ya anthu, kusamuka, katundu wotayika, matenda a kumpoto chakumadzulo, phindu lalikulu la Fushan
第X籤: Lowani makumi anayi ndi asanu ndi awiri
